schema.title: Transfer Tokens From
schema.description: Transfers the amount of tokens from the owner address to the recipient.

owner.title: Owner of Tokens
owner.description: The owner address that has the tokens to transfer.

amount-warning.description: The amount specified cannot exceed the allowance of the address executing TransferFrom.

amount.title: Amount to Transfer
amount.description: The amount of tokens to transfer.

recipient.title: Recipient of Transfer
recipient.description: The address to transfer the tokens to.
